title: 1984년 Powell 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Powell. 판결일: 1984-02-27. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Clifton Powell
**판결일**: 1984-02-27
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 99 A.D.2d 847

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by defendant from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Kings County (Shaw, J.), rendered January 5,1982, convicting him of robbery in the second degree, upon a jury verdict, and imposing sentence. Judgment affirmed. Many of the contentions raised by defendant have not been preserved for review and the others are without merit. Mollen, P. J., Titone, O’Connor and Weinstein, JJ., concur.
...
